message: Hi Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $9,500. I believe it will be highly valuable to you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $9,500 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $8,500. This reflects the value I see in the product and gives you a fair price considering your cost.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but I can't sell it for less than $9,000. This product is highly sought after, and I'm confident it will bring you significant value.

Alice, I understand the product is valuable, but $9,000 is still too high for me. I'm willing to offer you $8,750. This is a fair compromise, and I believe we can both reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
